<div id="HomePageContentContainer">
 <div id="home1Box">
  <div id="home1aBox">
   <div id="home1a">
    <a name="content"></a><img src="index_files/txt_qualifications_authority.gif" alt="Qualifications and Curriculum Authority" border="0" height="56" width="225">
    <p>The Qualifications and Curriculum Authority (QCA) is committed to
 building a world-class education and training framework that meets the 
changing needs of individuals, business and society.  We lead 
developments in curriculum, assessments, examinations and 
qualifications.


</p>
   </div>
  </div>
  <div id="home1bBox">
   <table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
